Articles.Content:
So, I recently picked up EVE Online on the midweek madness sale, for only 5Ã¢â€šÂ¬! I've downloaded it and as I write this it is doing some final prep in the launcher. Any protips for a newb? Also, what race do you recommend? I read a bit and I think I like the Minmatar (But I only read about them ). I want a race that's easy for newbs. Also, can you change your race later on even if it means a reset of your stuff?

Thank you in advance and sorry for being so curious

Scott Manley to the rescue!

Also you should know that it is a monthly subscription,if you dont already know that is.

Scott Manley to the rescue!

Also you should know that it is a monthly subscription,if you dont already know that is.

Really? Even on steam?
yes, but if you will play it, i think that from time to time, they get some % off in the subscription fees on steam

So, I recently picked up EVE Online on the midweek madness sale, for only 5Ã¢â€šÂ¬! I've downloaded it and as I write this it is doing some final prep in the launcher. Any protips for a newb? Also, what race do you recommend? I read a bit and I think I like the Minmatar (But I only read about them ). I want a race that's easy for newbs. Also, can you change your race later on even if it means a reset of your stuff?

Thank you in advance and sorry for being so curious

It doesn't actually matter what race you pick, it only affects your starting skills. I started with Gallente but am now mainly flying Caldari and Minmatar ships.

As for how to get started, it would be easier to explain in game. So if you're having trouble, feel free to add me to your contacts in EVE - I'll be happy to help My dude's name is Benjamin Gareth Crendraven.
Trust nobody, don't fly anything you can't afford to lose, adapt or die. Yarr.

I'd be happy to help you get started, and let you into my corperation: C7 Areospace

My ingame name is Buzz Ohmiras. Contact me whenever you want, and I'll show you the ropes.

Really? Even on steam?

Says so right on the store page, in a big orange box to grab your attention:

Monthly subscription fee required after first month.
Monthly subscription is not at all unusual for an MMO.

Still, 15Ã¢â€šÂ¬ per month is totally worth it. If you have a job and it's at least somewhat decent you would easily earn enough to be able to buy a month of subscription time every single day.

The cool thing is, once you're making enough money in the game, you can use that to buy more subscription time. But it costs A LOT, and you'll probably have to play for several months before you're able to earn enough.

Edited July 29, 2014 by CaptainKorhonen
